form.name: complementary_feeding_for_children_9_to_less_than_12_months_of_age_four
form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Feeding A Healthy Child > Complementary Feeding For Children 9 – < 12 MONTHS OF AGE FOUR

field.name: Good hygiene is important to avoid diarrhoea and other illnesses
Use a clean spoon or cup to give foods or liquids to your child
Store foods to be given to your baby in a safe hygienic place
Wash your hands with soap and water before preparing foods and feeding child
Wash your hands and child’s hands before eating
Wash your hands with soap and water after using toilet and washing or cleaning child’s bottom
